name: flexible-slider-and-carousel
description: A comprehensive WordPress plugin for creating sliders and carousels using Gutenberg blocks

scripts.build: webpack --mode=production && node scripts/create-pot.js && node scripts/po-to-mo.js languages/flexible-slider-and-carousel-de_DE.po && node scripts/po-to-jed.js languages/flexible-slider-and-carousel-de_DE.po && node scripts/hash-json.js
scripts.release:patch: git add -A && git commit -m "Prepare release" && npm version patch && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: git add -A && git commit -m "Prepare release" && npm version minor && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: git add -A && git commit -m "Prepare release" && npm version major && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push && git push --tags
